text: Route tables and routes GWS academy » Aroutetable contains a set of rules . (or routes) that you can configure to Main (Default) Route Table direct network traffic from your subnet. « Each route specifies a destination and N a target. « By default, every route table contains a _loqal route for communication within the VPC. VPC CIDR block * Each subnet must be associated with a route table (at most one).
